item.description:
I was SO. BUMMED. about the Martha's Vineyard Bike Ride getting cancelled. Let's still get together today (tonight) to hear some music and do some dancing!
Sound Tower is a fun local band, and they play a great mix of music. They start at 10. You can check out their playlist on their FaceBook page.
As always, it's not so much what we do but the fun group of people doing it! So, I hope to see lots of peeps tonight:)
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Roger - there wont be too many big red headed guys with a goatee

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dance Away The Blues
